content: cute and practical storage always makes a great gift les petites choses drawstring bags are perfect for keeping track of those little things that need a special place craft supplies jewelry or hair accessories add a pretty and tidy touch to any room les petites choses feature a flat base for stability and a textured lower portion to encourage upright standing eyelet detailing pairs with a 2-stitch i-cord to create a drawstring closure this project is worked from the top down incorporating enough variety to keep experienced knitters engaged while using a simple stitch pattern accessible to beginners instructions are included for three sizes
